adventuregame.items module¶

class items.Dagger¶

Bases: items.Weapon

A Weapon that deals 10 damage.

class items.Gold(amount)¶

Bases: items.Item

Item that can be found to give the player more gold.

amount¶

The amount of gold that is added on pick up.

Type

int

class items.HealthPotion(name, description, value, healing)¶

Bases: items.Item

Superclass to specific healing items.

healing¶

Amount of Health Points the potion heals.

Type

int

class items.Item(name, description, value)¶

Bases: object

Superclass of all items in the game.

name¶

Name of the item.

Type

str

description¶

Short description what the item is/does.

Type

str

value¶

Value the item has when buying or selling it.

Type

int

class items.LargeHealthPotion¶

Bases: items.HealthPotion

A Healthpotion that restores 50 Health Points.

class items.SmallHealthPotion¶

Bases: items.HealthPotion

A Healthpotion that restores 30 Health Points.

class items.Stone¶

Bases: items.Weapon

A Weapon that deals 5 damage.

class items.Sword¶

Bases: items.Weapon

A Weapon that deals 25 damage.

class items.Weapon(name, description, value, damage)¶

Bases: items.Item

Superclass for all Weapons in the game.

damage¶

The amount of damage the weapon does to the enemy’s Health Points.

Type

int
